[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Full marks on
your smile, as always!
ch0018_40_chris/0101_0701_02_10: Excited to go to school? Hehe, me too!
ch0018_40_chris/7101_0701_01_10:

here on Pasio!
ch0018_40_chris/7101_0701_02_10: If everyone from Johto joins the academy...

ch0018_40_chris/7105_0701_01_10:
What all are you looking forward to at the
academy, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

I had to make a list of everything I
wanna try!
ch0018_40_chris/7105_0701_03_10:
First, I want to join a study group! I’ve
always wanted to team up with others
so we can learn from one another!
ch0018_40_chris/1701_0701_01_10: I’ve got a present for you! Here, take it!
ch0018_40_chris/1701_0702_01_10: I’m sure your use of it will get full marks!
ch0018_40_chris/2501_0701_01_10:
I’d like to take any of the available classes,
but I’m especially interested in Mr. Clavell’s
and Mr. Jacq’s.
ch0018_40_chris/2501_0701_02_10:
Both were Pokémon researchers before they
became teachers.
ch0018_40_chris/2501_0701_03_10: I look forward to learning from them!
ch0018_40_chris/2501_0702_01_10: Whose classes are you interested in?
ch0018_40_chris/2501_0702_02_10: If you decide, let me know! I’ll join you!
ch0018_40_chris/3001_0701_01_10:
The earlier I wake up, the more chances
I have to meet cool Pokémon!
ch0018_40_chris/3003_0701_01_10:
If I ever get info on a rare Pokémon,
I’ll be sure to let you know, OK?

Even on nights with no moonlight or stars,
you can still make out the Pokémon eyes in
the dark.
